Title: Relates to protecting students, faculty, and staff from civil arrest while attending or participating in school activities
Summary: Prohibits civil arrest in school settings; prohibits all public and charter schools from allowing law enforcement officials inside school property to access a student, except to address an imminent safety situation or if they have an appropriate judicial warrant or judicial order.
LawCode: Add ยง29, Civ Rts L; add ยง409-o, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law and the education law, in relation to protecting students, faculty, and staff from civil arrest while attending or participating in school activities
